name: A-Maze-Ing (Plus67)
description: There's not much to say about this game...... ummmmmmm however one important note: there is no ending screen and there are only 15 levels....so when you finish the 15th level, you will have to go back to the menu and exit. And thanks for all the support, i recently hit 100 views and 50 downloads. So thanks! :)
